title: Blitzkrieg Anthology
notes: The game runs great, no graphical issues, no performance issues, it runs completely stable. The performance issues people experience when running this game via Winetricks and PlayonLinux are absent.

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX Vega (VEGA10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.8-arch1-1-ARCH, LLVM 6.0.1)
notes: Game has weird lags with Proton 3.7(stable) but runs completely fine with 3.7-6 Beta. It runs significantly better under Proton then it does natively on modern Windows machines.
title: Blitzkrieg Anthology
